## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                    | Type                               | Default      |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------- | ------------ |
| `color`  | `color`   | Color, Entered as one of the color. Can be one of: 'default', 'white'.         | `"default" \| "white"`             | `'default'`  |
| `size`   | `size`    | Size, Entered as one of the size. Can be one of: 'small', 'standard', 'large'. | `"large" \| "small" \| "standard"` | `'standard'` |
